rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a small reception area and storage.
Open-plan living room adjoining the dining area with eco-friendly wooden flooring and large windows for natural light. Vastu-aligned towards the east to capture morning sunlight.
Dining room integrated within the living space; features energy-efficient LED lighting and Vastu compliant south-east corner placement.
Eco-friendly kitchen with sustainable materials, water-efficient fixtures. Positioned towards the north-west for optimal energy flow.
Studio duplex living space integrated with a small study area and flexible layout ensuring both privacy and openness. Vastu-compliant central placement for balance.
Functional bathroom featuring low-flow fixtures and energy-efficient lighting. Placed in the northeast for positive energy alignment.

openings.description: Large east-facing window to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu principles.
Main entry door with energy-efficient design.
South-west facing window to ensure proper ventilation and alignment.
Private access door with eco-friendly glass.

additional_features.description: Eco-friendly swimming pool integrated into the outdoor space with water recycling system and solar heating.
